title: GAMEBREAKING BUG!! - Can't Move Camera (includes video)

embed.description: I start a game and cannot move my screen by moving my mouse. Camera lock and Camera lock with scroll both work but upon unlocking my camera I cannot move the camera at all. f9 and changing video formats (fullscreen, windowed, borderless) do nothing. Please help!

body:
This bug has been occurring to me randomly every so often for the past couple months. It just started happening more frequently, to the point I'm scared of queuing up.

I start a game to find I cannot move the camera with my mouse, that is, scrolling to the edge of the screen does nothing.

Camera lock and Camera lock with scroll still work, but upon unlocking it I cannot move the camera at all.

F9 and changing video formats (fullscreen, windowed, borderless) do nothing. PLEASE HELP!

replies.body:
Hmmm...it's possible that there is some sort of corrupted setting with the League installation that is causing the camera to not work as intended.  Fortunately, there is an easy fix that should resolve this:

1. Make sure that you are logged into the client
2.  Go to your League installation:  C: -- Riot Games -- League of Legends -- Config
3.  Delete the following 2 files:  Game.cfg and PersistedSettings.json
4.  Go into the client and start a new Custom Game

This should force all of your in-game settings to default, but it should also resolve this issue.  

If this doesn't help, let me know!
How do I do that? Can you make a video and send it to me because I do not know what you are talking about I'm sorry
It worked!!! Thank you so so much!! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Unfortunately I won't be able to try this until tomorrow morning (sister borrowing laptop), but I definitely will! Thank you so much!

So I've had a similar issue but perhaps my circumstances are different. I play on Windowed Bordered, and sometimes if i click off of league, it will auto-lock the camera (even if the option is not toggled) The way I've found to fix this, and who knows maybe you'll have some luck with this, is as follows:

Hold Left Click on the minimap and scroll around the map briefly.
Then hit space. You will be auto-locked on your champion again.
Repeat the first step, and your camera will be no longer locked.


It works for me, hopefully it will help you too.
